title: Immersive Technology Integration Strategies for Higher Education Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language comprehension and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Implementation of AR/VR-Based Language Context Simulations in Smartphone-Centric Limited-Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can recreate and communicate real-life language scenarios with over 80% accuracy using AR/VR tools.
Learners can complete problem-solving tasks in the target language with over 70% proficiency in immersive learning environments.
Learners can produce three or more immersive task deliverables with peer learners using digital collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
